Character

Class CivilianCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Utility.Entity
        • Character.Character
          • Character.CivilianCharacter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interactable, Moveable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class CivilianCharacter
extends Character
implements Moveable, java.lang.Cloneable
    A CivilianCharacter is a NPC with carries a certain amount of quests. It is responsible for giving out quests to players and also to give the rewards when completed.
    Version:
    2013-02-28
    Author:
    Johan Nilsson Hansen, Alexander Persson & Jimmy Svensson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • interact

        public void interact(PlayerCharacter player)
        Method for interacting with the Civilian character. The method will check if the supplied player has any rewards to receive, if so, give out rewards. It will also update the statistics for the player and give new quests.
        Specified by:
        interact in interface Interactable
        Parameters:
        player - The user-controlled player.
